about_the_game:
You are a field doctor's assistant who was heading to a distant village to help local peasants. Someone attacked your stagecoach and you wake up in a mass grave, being the only survivor. Curb your fear because you are waiting for facing incredible beasts and monsters, and you are just a human.

The brutal and dangerous world of Redemption of the Damned will not give the chance to slack off, the slightest mistake may be the last.

SURVIVE


In the first turn the enemy is dangerous not by the number. Even among people there are those who themselves want to see how the world is ablaze. Do not let evil spirits prevail over you, help the locals, but do not forget about yourself - you also need water, food and sleep. But the most important thing is not to go crazy. To do this, keep your mental health normal with the help of potions and altars.


EXPLORE

The RoD universe is much bigger than it seems. How many secrets lie in forgotten but not abandoned ruins? How many answers can you find in the dark corners of the world around you?




Find everything you need for battle and survival. Explore multi-level dungeons in search of relic items.

HUNT

Go to the open world after the battles in dungeons network to replenish your resources in special hunting zones consisting of forests, swamps, fields etc. Having gained strength, return to the kingdom of darkness, because in the fight against evil it is you who are the main and only hope of the locals for survival.


WATCH YOUR BACK

Mortal danger is everywhere. Dangerous monsters, supernatural monsters with its own behavior and specific mechanics... There is no single way to deal with each of them.




Carefully study your enemy, prepare thoroughly and choose the appropriate way to kill. Melee combat, traditional and unique firearms, and, of course, specific ways of killing (cross, holy water, aspen stakes, witch's candles etc) are available to you.
And remember the most important rule - "always finish the fallen creature, without giving a chance for revenge".

name: Redemption of the Damned

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Redemption of the Damned is a survival horror in the scenery of XVII century Europe.You are a field doctor's assistant who was heading to a distant village to help local peasants. Someone attacked your stagecoach and you wake up in a mass grave, being the only survivor.
